name: Petra Aknizon
description:
2D platformer based in steampunk-inspired world.
The player is an old steam-powered robot that, due to said longevity, starts to fall apart, losing each fragment of his body whenever he uses it. That's why he needs to keep on rebuilding himself in order to reach the goal.

Controls:

WASD/Keys - Move
W/Up - Double Jump with jetpack
Left Shift - Activate Glider
Spacebar - Toggle Camera Lock
E - Push Button using your hands
